mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, temperature, humidity, light_upper as lightUpper, light_lower as lightLower, create_time as createTime FROM thresholds ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO thresholds ( user_id, temperature, humidity, light_upper, light_lower, create_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{temperature}, #{humidity}, #{lightUpper}, #{lightLower}, NOW() )
